# Risor Kammermusikkfest

> Norway's premier chamber music festival held annually in Risør since 1991. Features world-class musicians performing classical and contemporary chamber music in intimate coastal settings.

## About the Festival
- [About](/en/about): Festival history, artistic vision, and mission
- [Program](/en/program): Complete concert schedule with dates, venues, and performers
- [Praktisk info](/en/practical): Getting here, accommodation, and venue information

## Artists
- [Featured Artists](/en/artists): Biographies of performing musicians and ensembles

## News
- [Articles](/en/articles): Latest festival news, announcements, and features

## Key Information
- **Location**: Risør, Agder, Norway
- **Founded**: 1991
- **Annual Duration**: One week in late June
- **Languages**: Norwegian (primary), English

## Optional

### Norwegian Pages
- [Forside](/): Norwegian homepage
- [Program](/program): Konsertprogram (Norwegian)
- [Artister](/artister): Artistbiografier (Norwegian)
- [Artikler](/artikler): Nyheter og artikler (Norwegian)

### Contact
For press inquiries, ticketing, or general information, visit the main website at kammermusikkfest.no
